content: In Harry Potter's world, what magical object was sought after by Nicolas Flamel and believed to produce the Elixir of Life?

In the Harry Potter series, the magical object sought after by Nicolas Flamel is the Philosopher's Stone (known as the Sorcerer's Stone in the U.S. edition). This stone is believed to have the power to produce the Elixir of Life, which can grant immortality to those who drink it, and also transform any metal into pure gold. The quest for the Philosopher's Stone is a central plot point in the first book and movie of the series.
